snippet: Russia's role in international affairs is diminished, at least temporarily. This is just one way the crisis over the Crimean annexation may affect global policies.
lead_paragraph: Russia's role in international affairs is diminished, at least temporarily. This is just one way the crisis over the Crimean annexation may affect global policies.

headline.print_headline: How the Ukraine Crisis May Change the World
headline.main: How the Ukraine Crisis May Change the World
